Specialties Music Production and Sound Design | Event Production, Promotion, and Sponsorship | Web 2.0 Marketing and Content | Mobile Content Marketing and Distribution | Strategic Alliances between the Entertainment and Technology Industries

Kama Sutra Lovers (Music Industry September 2008 â€“ Present)

Siddhu and Diana Ayanna are no strangers to the music industry. Their love of music, textural rhythms, fashion, glamour, mysticism, and all things artistic, led them to merge forces and create the Kama Sutra Lovers as an avatar for their creative energies. This Parisien duo is exploring new dimensions of DJ’ing and live electronic music on stage using drum machines, synths, live vocals, and laptops running Ableton Live.

With these elements, the Kama Sutra Lovers not only reference the history of modern electronic music performance and DJ culture, but move into it’s next phase: the exciting combination of live performance using drum machines, synths, and vocals, with on the fly remixing and deconstruction of tracks on a granular level with micro loops.

Convergence Strategist and Media Futurist (Marketing and Advertising industry 1996 - Present)

Siddhu has been been retained by leading technology companies specializing in audio coding, music production software, surround sound, and mobile content delivery. Music industry clients have included record labels, bands, and artists. Siddhu’s hybrid marketing strategies for entertainment and technology clients blend sponsorship, event production, product placement, celebrity PR, and co-branding.
